text: Peace is the one condition of survival in this nuclear age.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

text: The journey of a thousand leagues begins with a single step. So we must never neglect any work of peace within our reach, however small.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

text: I could start a war in 30 seconds. But some countries spend 100 years trying to find peace. Just like good manners, peace has to be learned.
author: Sylvester Stallone

text: Revenge only engenders violence, not clarity and true peace. I think liberation must come from within.
author: Sandra Cisneros
